text: Nandao ni meiyou kanjian buxu mitan er weijin mitan de ren ma? Tamen mitan de, shi guanyu zui'e, qinhai he weikang shizhe de shi. Tamen lai jian ni de shi hou, yong zhenzhu suo wei yong de zhuci zhuhe ni, tamen zi yan zi yu de shuo:“Zhenzhu hebu yin women suo shuo dehua er chengfa women ne!” Huo yu shi neng shi tamen manzu de, tamen jiang ru qizhong, na guisu zhen elie
